info.description:
The code does not implement all the possible language operator but will works
with most file.

Used as an application, the output is similar to the file command.
info.name: pymagic
info.summary: A python implementation of the unix file command (see man 4 magic).
info.html_description:
The code does not implement all the possible language operator but will works with most file.

Used as an application, the output is similar to the file command.
